Class Note

java.lang.Object
  Note

public class Note
extends Object

Note

A class containing information about an individual note. This includes the Note's "value," representing its position on the range between A0 and C8, "octave," the Note's octave, ranging from 0 to 8, and "noteName," the Note's letter name (A#, Bb, C, etc.)

Version:
3.0
Author:
Devon Hubert
